author: AustenAdams
title: Perfect for shopping and western food
text:
This hotel is located on the main shopping street in Beijing. 30 mins from the airport 150 RMB in a normal cab. You can safely walk out of the door to the shops. The silk market if 15 mins away by cab if you prefer copies.
There is a good buffet restaurant plus a traditional Chinese one in the hotel. Within walking distance you will find many western food outlets like McDonald's and KFC. Don't miss the Chinese night market with an amazing array of odd food on sticks!
